src:
IHSGÂ Dibuka Melempem ke 6.261
06 Nov 2019, 02:08 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka negatif pagi ini. IHSG turun 3,9 poin (0,05%) ke level 6.261.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 13.973.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 9,7 poin (0,16%) ke 6.273. Indeks LQ45 juga menguat ke 998.Membuka perdagangan Rabu (6/11/2019), IHSG turun 3,9 poin (0,05%) ke level 6.261. Indeks LQ45 juga turun 2,5 poin (0,25%) poin ke 996.Mengutip Artha Sekuritas, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,63 (+0,11%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.434,68 (+0,02%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.074,62 (-0,12%). Bursa saham AS ditutup bercampur, index Dow Jones masih mencatatkan all-time high. Fokus investor saat ini masih pada perjanjian perdagangan antara AS-China yang akan ditandatangani pada November 2019 ini. Pihak AS mengatakan pada fase 1 ini akan menunjukkan komitmen yang lebih pasti untuk mengurangi tarif impor dari China. Namun, investor akan tetap skeptis pada keputusan perdagangan AS-China setelah beberapa kali pihak US mengingkari persetujuan dari beberapa persetujuan sebelumnya. Pasar Asia dibuka menguat terbatas mengikuti perkembangan pasar AS.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak di dua arah, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 naik 26 poin ke 23.278
Indeks Hang Seng turun 79 poin ke 27.604
Indeks Shanghai naik 0,6 poin ke 2.990
Indeks Strait Times menguat 14 poin ke 3.262


Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "

text:
JCI Opened Slamming to 6,261
Nov 6 2019, 02:08 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened negative this morning. The Jakarta Composite Index dropped 3.9 points (0.05%) to 6,261. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning was at the level of Rp 13,973. to 6,273. The LQ45 index also strengthened to 998. Opened trading Wednesday (11/06/2019), the JCI dropped by 3.9 points (0.05%) to the level of 6,261. The LQ45 index also dropped 2.5 points (0.25%) points to 996. Quoting Artha Sekuritas, the United States (US) exchange closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.63 (+ 0.11%), NASDAQ closed 8,434.68 (+ 0.02%), S&P 500 closed 3,074.62 (-0.12%). US stock markets closed mixed, the Dow Jones index was still recording an all-time high. The focus of investors is still on the trade agreement between the US-China which will be signed in November 2019. The US said in phase 1 it would show a more certain commitment to reduce import tariffs from China. However, investors will remain skeptical of US-China trade decisions after several times the US reneged on the agreement of several previous agreements. Asian markets opened limited gains following the development of the US market. Asian stocks moved this morning in two directions, following their movements:

The Nikkei 225 index rose 26 points to 23,278
The Hang Seng Index fell 79 points to 27,604
The Shanghai index rose 0.6 points to 2,990
The Strait Times Index rose 14 points to 3,262


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
